definition: Sports played with hand-held implements used to strike a ball or shuttlecock across a playing area

positive_examples: She won the tennis championship with a powerful forehand
The badminton player made a spectacular overhead smash
He practiced his squash serves in the enclosed court
The ping-pong tournament featured incredible rallies
She joined the racquetball league at her local gym
The tennis coach taught proper grip technique
negative_examples: The baseball player swung his bat at the fastball
She kicked the soccer ball into the goal
He threw a perfect spiral in football practice
The basketball team practiced their free throws
She served an ace in the volleyball match
The golf club made contact with the ball on the tee
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: TeamSports, WaterSports, CombatSports, TrackAndField
